product_name: Bison Designs Kool Tool Belt - Men's
long_description: Take your toolbox on the trail. The Bison Designs Kool Tool(TM) Belt features a buckle that incorporates handy tools so you can make quick, on-the-go repairs. Steel buckle includes 3 wire strippers in varying sizes, large and small flathead screwdrivers, Phillips head screwdriver and bottle opener. Buckle also features S.A.E. hex tool, standard and metric ruler, and metric hex tool. The Bison Designs Kool Tool is made of durable nylon webbing fabric. Size medium fits waists up to 38 in.; size large fits up to 42 in.
short_description: Take your toolbox on the trail. The Bison Designs Kool Tool(TM) Belt features a buckle that incorporates handy tools so you can make quick, on-the-go repairs.
